scenes.name: the time riddle
scenes.description:
Carved into the wall is a stone face of an old bearded man. A glowing blue light comes from behind the carving's eyes, and a strange voice bellows from behind the face. 

"HEED THIS, TRAVELER - YOU SHALL RECEIVE A GREAT GIFT IF YOU CAN SOLVE MY RIDDLE.
THIS THING ALL THINGS DEVOURS - 
BIRDS, BEASTS, TREES, AND FLOWERS.
GNAWS IRON BITES STEEL,
GRINDS HARD STONES TO MEAL,
SLAYS KING, RUINS TOWN,
AND BEATS HIGH MOUNTAIN DOWN." 

 - give up

scenes.name: take
scenes.description:
The voice booms, 
"WELL DONE, TRAVELER. TAKE THIS, THE SCYTHE OF CRONUS - THE KING OF TITANS, THE GOD OF TIME." 
 A strange, black metallic scythe with golden inscriptions materializes before you. 
 - take it
